Module moffett.scheduler
Package moffett.scheduler.controller

Class DirectoryController

java.lang.Object
moffett.scheduler.controller.DirectoryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class DirectoryController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the directory-view.fxml that shows all customers and user appointments in table views, allows the user to add or edit them, and allows the user to generate reports.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initialize method that sets the value factories for the tableView columns, creates filtered lists for filtered appointment data and adds listeners to radio buttons to display the filtered info. - CONTAINS LAMBDAS LAMBDA JUSTIFICATION - The first two lambdas are used to set the filteredList conditions for both the list that will contain all appointments this week and all appointments this month. This allows the conditions to be set in a compact way in a relevant location without having to define two separate functions for each condition. The third lambda adds a listener to the radioButton toggle group that again concisely sets the filtered items into the table in a relevant location.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -
